name: duck duck swap
description:
Are you a duck? Or a duck? Or a duck? Race against the clock to collect 10 slices of bread to feed yourself during winter! Swap ducks to unlock different abilities & get that bread!!

This is my submission for my second game jam (Newbies Game Jam)! The theme was minimalism & optional challenges were alone, you are the enemy & everything is dangerous. Everything (minus SFX) were made from scratch (no assets/plug-ins) using Blender/Unity/Photoshop & was completed solo! I'm entirely self-taught & have been learning for 6 weeks!

Game breakdown:

Minimalism: A low-poly art style & basic UI elements were used throughout the game design. In addition, the game objective was kept to a simple collection system. 

Alone: Even though there are two ducks to play as, they're both controlled by you (but only one at a time)! No NPC help or 2 player option available.

You are the enemy: You're on your own collecting bread slices! The ducks do not work together toward the total slices & each have their own total.

Everything is dangerous: Well maybe not everything, but there are things that can hurt you if you're not careful!

Controls: wasd to move, space to jump, mouse for camera, left click to pick up, esc for pause/rules & x to swap.

Browser play: Click into the game window to enable mouse movement if you get stuck! Also if you're lagging a bit, make sure you have enablers on (you can do that by following these steps)!

Tutorial:

Features:

🦆 2  playable ducks!

🦆 11 unique interactions!

🦆 6 interactable items!

🦆 1 minimap showing ducks & ants!

🦆 Enough bread to fill a bakery!

*Not playable on mobile devices!

SFX: Animals! & Gooseberry Platinum

[Jam results: pending]

Special mentions: Thanks so much to Yo & Shan for beta testing for me!
